channel.title: ElementalUniverse. (RELEASED) [Devo 2.7]
channel.description:
I have been working on this for a while, doing things here and there. But in the end i started moving away from runescape and living life. (AND COD). since then i have gotten contax and the client developer (benny, moved on in life) has also done the same. He has also deleted the client and i have too (sorry). So here it is, a unfinished base that has much protential.
[B]PLEASE NOTE THIS SERVER HAS SPECIFICS TO RUNESCAPE, EVERYTHING IS BASED OFF OF RUNESCAPE. XP RATE IS BASED OFF RUNESCAPE WITH A MULTIPLAYER.[/B]
[ul][*]Fixed pvp prayer system ( even added dark bow (hits 3-3 on prayer, 5-5 without or something i forget) [*]Lootshare system [*]Start of lunar [*]Ancient Quest [*]Fixed magic Timing [*]Ancient spell effects. [*]Npc poisoning [*]Inproved npc combat [*]WorldMap Loading (martins way, This point i started loosing intrest) [*]Editing npc drop system. base drops such as bones etc [*]Full fight caves [*]Start of Treasure Trails [*]God wars, with correct projectiles etc. (everything is 474, items, gfx, etc) [*]Perfect Dark bow special [*]Most process converted to events [*]Mina network.(credits to Riotscape Creaters [*]Some packets are using hashmaps (after colby posted that guide) [*]Better npc attack loading [*]Dumped npc size and object size to use. [*]Full barrows minigame [*]All godsword effects. [*]Redone skills, more efficent and easier to use. [*]Some others, can't remember. [*]OH YEA, FULL DAG LAYER. [*]WORKING NPC TRANSFORMATION MASK(thnx blake) - Full Gargoyle.[/ul]
for videos go to, don't got pictures, so if somone can take them for me.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/elementaluniverse]www.youtube.com/elementaluniverse[/url]
*USE A IDE*
FileNeeded: [url=http://www.filefront.com/15394233/Downloads.rar]http://www.filefront.com/15394233/Downloads.rar[/url] (add these to your language files in your java version.) Server: [url=http://www.filefront.com/15394173/Elemental.rar]http://www.filefront.com/15394173/Elemental.rar[/url] MIRROR: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/1dqudrljmtt/Elemental.rar]http://www.mediafire.com/file/1dqudrljmtt/Elemental.rar[/url] EXTRA: [url=http://uppit.com/v/uu16l8b7]http://uppit.com/v/uu16l8b7[/url]
CLIENT:NONE! use any client that has 474 items/anims/gfx
Credits:
Me Killa Benny Riotscape creaters(not geting into that) Colby_ Blake others but can't think

Exactly, you will need the client to connect i tryed 2 diffrent 474 clients both of them log me in and right back out…

And a question if you dont mind me asking…

Is this a 474 server/client or a 317 server/client?
Its a 317 server that is set to use a 317 client that has been modified to load 474 things. so pretty much any client you see nowadays.[/quote]
